I don't mind sacrificing knights for bishops.
moves.7... Nxe5 8. Be2 c6 9. Qd4 Bd6 10. f4 c5: And I thought for sure that this was a good thing, too.
moves.14... c4 15. b3 Bxa3: I did not see that coming at all.  He trapped my queen.
I thought that I was done by this point, but my oppenent kept telling me that I have a chance; that I should use my bishops.
moves.20... Rb8 21. O-O d4 22. Rbd1 Qe7 23. Bx: There's a bishop use, plus I put him in check right there.
moves.23... Kd8 24. b5 Ng4 25. Bxe7+: Now I'm up on top with my "bishop" and I put him in check, too.
moves.25... Kxe7 26. Rfe1 axb5 27. exd4+ Kd6 2: I had to really think throughout the whole entire game because this is a really good player.  I can't afford to make any mistakes.
moves.33. Rg3 h5 34. a5 Ra6 35. Bb7 Rf6 36. a6: I have his rook and king pinned if he tries to take out any of my pieces.
moves.36... Rb6 37. Ra5+ Kd4 38. h3 Ne3 39. Rx: Then I wanted to get all his pieces out so he couldn't use them later.
moves.41. a7: It's a race to the queenhood.
I didn't lose much, because at least I got his rook out.  That was my goal right there.  In some cases, you have to be a power house.
moves.44... Ne3 45. Rh7 h4 46. Rxh4: Take that stupid pawn out of there.
moves.46... Qg6 47. f5+: check for the king and the queen.  He's gotta do it.
moves.47... Qg4 48. Rxg4+ Nxg4+: He took out my rook, but I took out his queen and his knight at the same time.
moves.49. hxg4 Ke3 50. g5 Kf2 51. f6 Rb8 52. K: The rook can't get my bishop, or else his rook will be captured.
moves.52... Rh8+ 53. Kg4: Oh, aren't you Mr. Tuff Guy.
moves.53... c3 54. Ra2+ Ke3 55. g6 Re8 56. f7: This is a battle right here, but I will eventually get my pawn up to the top.  I know I will.  I know I will.
moves.57. Kf5 Rf4+ 58. Ke5: That was a wasted move, Matthew.  Why the heck did I do that?
moves.63... Kd2 64. d6 Rb2 65. Be4 c2 66. Bxc2: I wasn't going to take any chances.
moves.66... Rb7+ 67. Qxb7: You could tell that he didn't see that.  I didn't see that myself.  That's why you have to look at the whole entire board before making any move.
moves.67... Kc1: I don't know why he didn't take out my bishop.
moves.68. d7 Kxc2: There we go, but now it's too late because...
moves.69. d8=R: This.  I actually don't know why it turned into a rook.  I wanted it to be a queen, but hey, it will still get the job done.
moves.69... Kc1 70. Qc7+ Kb2 71. Rb8+ Ka2: Sorry.  Good game.  You really are a good player.  Just don't play when you are drunk next time.
moves.72. Qa7#:
This honestly was actually one of my first team wins.  I don't have very many team wins right now.  I'm probably at like -13 right now?  I don't know.  Thank you for watching this annotation.  It was very kind of you.  Drop me a message sometime.

-Number1thespian (Matthew W. Martin)
